posts.name: Hüseyin Arda Çavdar
posts.cooked: Problems In Robot Comm Our team’s roboRio is connecting to imaging tools but it doesn’t update so we can’t switch to another version. (We tried ethernet and usb connections and we couldn’t get robot comm connection in both of them and we also don’t have a radio so we can’t make a wireless connection)

posts.name: Sam Mulvey
posts.cooked: What LEDs do you see on the rio when you connect? Does it show up in the imaging tool? Are you giving the rio external power?

posts.name: Hüseyin Arda Çavdar
posts.cooked: The power led is green, the rsl led is red and there are no leds turning on roborio that can be seen in imagining tool by usb but we can’t uptade roborio via imaginig tool for extra we also can’t connect roborio in driverstation by ethernet.

posts.name: thomasjosif
posts.cooked: Do you have the rio 2? (You can tell by seeing if it has a micro SD card slot beside the usb ports)

posts.name: thomasjosif
posts.cooked:
Ok, so we can rule out the SD card fun.

Some pictures and screenshots would make diagnosing this a little easier.

Can you take a picture of the Rio status LED’s, and a screenshot of what you are seeing in the imaging tool?

posts.name: tkchan
posts.cooked: Tried disconnecting everything else but only keep the power to the RoboRIO and use the USB cable.  Make sure that the USB port of your computer is in operational state as well.  Plug in the USB cable to the RIO and then power on the RIO.  The tool only works on Windows (Windows 10 and 11) and not on any virtualized OS (i.e. parallel or wine).

posts.name: Brad
posts.cooked: Have you tried a different computer? Trouble shooting guide mentions problems if the computer has a dash in the name.

posts.name: Hüseyin Arda Çavdar
posts.cooked: We formatted roborio right now with new computer but should we uptade new version and what is the name of new version

posts.name: Brad
posts.cooked: I don’t think the 2023 version is public yet. I am not in the beta to know if you need another version.   I would stick with what was available with the 2022 tools.  I am glad you have it formatted now.

posts.name: Hüseyin Arda Çavdar
posts.cooked: thanks for helping we are going to search firmare versions if we found we are going to uptade it

posts.name: Hüseyin Arda Çavdar
posts.cooked: Uptade: We recieved comms light and its succesfully working thanks for all your helps
